options.option-heading: Hero banner with blue transparent overlay and second call-to-action
options.heading: Scotland’s first university
options.paragraph: Discover what it’s like to study at St Andrews. Search undergraduate courses, explore postgraduate opportunities or find flexible study options.

options.option-heading: Hero banner with dark green transparent overlay with embedded video
options.heading: Discovering the Chanka
options.paragraph: Who were the Chanka? Dr Sabine Hyland from the Department of Social Anthropology has conducted ethnohistorical and ethnographic research on the Chanka people of Peru.

options.option-heading: Hero banner with burgundy and orange gradient overlay with embedded video
options.heading: Visit St Andrews
options.paragraph: Experience St Andrews for yourself by coming to one of our visiting days. Find out more about the town, University, and your subject of choice.

options.option-heading: Hero banner with purple and orange gradient overlay
options.heading: Choose St Andrews
options.paragraph: Study at the University of St Andrews and experience world-class teaching, cutting edge research and the flexible degree structure of Scotland’s first university.

options.option-heading: Hero banner with orange and yellow gradient overlay
options.heading: International St Andrews
options.paragraph: You can meet our staff all over the world. We visit schools, attend fairs and run events through the year.
